bgDescription: One of the must-have dishes at the Huanglong New Year's feast. Because of its sour, sweet, and crispy taste, it is popular with children and is also known as "Kid's Delight" by the people. Perhaps the heartfelt smile of happiness on the childrenâ€™s faces when they taste the sweetness of this dish is more satisfactory the dish itself.
description: Increases Echo drop rate by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases Echo drop rate by 50%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
unlockDescription: You need ["item=Sweet & Sour Pork Recipe"] to unlock it.
